website_summaries.verdict: For those who seek a flash card approach to CFA exam preparation, this workbook presents a series of quick mental exercises that supplement more detailed study guides.
pros: Over 300 CFA-style questions, works well as a refresher or reinforcement course
Very affordable addition to other study materials
cons: Questions and answers are short and concise, not as detailed as the standard questions found on the CFA exam

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect answers for several problems in the book!
customer_reviews.text: Numerous calculation errors - very poor quality. For instance Corporate Finance and Portfolio Management #12 they use the weights instead of standard deviation when calculating the covariance! Use with caution.
customer_reviews.author: Ethics Gradient

customer_reviews.title: they are pretty helpful. I haven't taken the exam so I ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are taking the CFA, there is no such thing as too much practice. This book contains 300 short practice calculation problems. So far, they are pretty helpful. I haven't taken the exam so I can't verify if they are exactly like exam questions, but they are good practice.
customer_reviews.author: PubDragon

customer_reviews.title: Doesn''t seem very representative of the exam
customer_reviews.text: So far, 1 went through 1/3 of all the questions in all of the topics. The problems feel pretty easy and repeated in other topics. Some concepts repeat in level 1, but I think these questions are too easy
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Very good prep workbook!
customer_reviews.text: Great workbook that covers all the chapters in the exam !
customer_reviews.author: Katharina O.

customer_reviews.title: Good review material
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to see the content which folks sitting for CFA exam I would be required to know. I am Happy Personal New Year with the content and will purchase 2019 version.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew T. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The book was delivered promptly and in good quality. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Mingshuai Hu

customer_reviews.title: Includes formulas and calculations for the CFA Level 1 math.
customer_reviews.text: Includes formulas and calculations for the CFA Level 1 math.
customer_reviews.author: Nebojsa

customer_reviews.title: Also, I have to agree with the other 1 ...
customer_reviews.text: Also, I have to agree with the other 1 star review (which is the only other verified purchase). There seem to be some simple calculation errors.
customer_reviews.author: sheep

customer_reviews.title: Value Book
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It is great to finally nice to see the regulars exam prep publishers get some competition. This book is to the point, and great for highlighting the areas of struggle once going through the problems. One should have some finance background before utilizing this. Anyways, well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: SATX

customer_reviews.title: too easy
customer_reviews.text: this is way too easy. if the Mock exam difficulty level is 10, and real exam difficulty level is 7, this book is at level 1.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Great for reverse engineering solutions!
customer_reviews.text: The content is organized really well, with plenty of room for notes. It has 50/ea for 6 topics: Quant. Methods, Econ. Analysis, Financial Starement Analysis, Corporate Finance, Equity & Fixed Income Investments, & Derivatives & Alt. Investments. The index is really helpful for quickly finding examples of topics you’re having issues with. It would be nice if multiple versions were made to cover more ground or get more repitition.
customer_reviews.author: kjasonk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am using this calculation workbook for the CFA Level I exam. The workbook is very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Kahn

customer_reviews.title: My favorite CFA Book!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful and comprehensive study book that helped me ace the exam! I am so grateful and impressed with the in depth analysis and explanations as well as the practice problems.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: good practice questions
customer_reviews.text: This is what I was looking for to help practice for the exam. It is like a question bank and the answers are provided with the financial calculator answers.
customer_reviews.author: Tina L Calvin

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Content
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for to study for the exam. Book is divided into 6 sections with an answer key for each. Explanations for the questions are very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn K Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Clear choice
customer_reviews.text: This book has everything you need to study for the quant portions of the CFA. Can’t recommend highly enough if you’re currently or will be studying
customer_reviews.author: Stephen DiMarco

customer_reviews.title: The questions are very good for practicing
customer_reviews.text: If you take CFA exam, this book will be really helpful for the exam. The questions are very good for practicing.
customer_reviews.author: ZICHENG LAI

customer_reviews.title: Great resource for extra problems
customer_reviews.text: I used this product in preparation for the exam just to get some extra practice. It helped me greatly. It offers additional problems and exposure so you can best hone your skills.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Splendido

customer_reviews.title: CFA Level 1 🔑
customer_reviews.text: Great view to drill down CFA calculations and concepts. A must have for any serious CFA candidate!
customer_reviews.author: DeVante Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great for preparation. Great value.
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a good practice book like this for my preparation.
customer_reviews.author: Prapassorn Tinnabavorn

customer_reviews.title: This book is pretty nice, concise
customer_reviews.text: This book is pretty nice, concise, up to the point and is very helpful to reinforce your memory and understanding in all the main topics tested on the CFA Level 1 exam. It has a lot of practice questions with the answers explained at the end of the book. I highly recommend this book to anyone studying for the CFA exam.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to understand and useful book - fast & responsive seller
customer_reviews.text: The book is easy to use and the examples are straight forward. There are plenty of practice questions for you to use. The seller got this book to me very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Solid Helpful Material, Reliable Seller
customer_reviews.text: Coventry House Publishing not only saved me money with preparing to take the CFA exam but their book has genuine material that will be helpful. I appreciate the time they took to make sure I was satisfied with my purchase. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Nyman

customer_reviews.title: Worth your money
customer_reviews.text: Nice additional question bank to help prepare for the exam. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Joey S.

product_meta.title: CFA Level 1 Calculation Workbook: 300 Calculations to Prepare for the CFA Level 1 Exam (2019 Edition)
